note.p: Education: Emmanuel College, Cambridge (matriculated 1638); Lincoln's Inn (admitted 1640)

Career: MP for Northamptonshire (1656-1658); MP for Northampton (1659-1661, 1662); Commissioner for Assessment for Northamptonshire (1657, 1660-1661, 1663-1680, 1689); Commissioner for Militia (1659); Sheriff of Northamptonshire (1664-1665); Commissioner for Public Accounts (1667-1670)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Hunter; GEC Baronetage; Henning; LI
Notes: Never in lists according to Hunter, who gives birth date as 1621. Henning gives place of death as Lincoln's Inn Fields
